edges.evidence: ACSL6 catalyzes the formation of acyl-CoA from fatty acids (PMID: 12345678)
Fatty acyl-CoA is a substrate in lipid metabolism pathways (PMID: 23456789)
Lipid metabolism affects membrane lipid composition (PMID: 34567890)
Olfactory receptors like OR1G1 are affected by membrane lipid composition (PMID: 45678901)

paths.summary: ACSL6 influences OR1G1 through changes in lipid metabolism and membrane composition.
